thread.title: Justin Bieber fans, here's how to get his Mumbai concert tickets on 22 February via BookMyShow - The Financial Express
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber fans, here's how to get his Mumbai concert tickets on 22 February via BookMyShow - The Financial Express

author: Fe Online
title: Justin Bieber fans, here's how to get his Mumbai concert tickets on 22 February via BookMyShow - The Financial Express
text:
Justin Bieber fans, here’s how to get his Mumbai concert tickets on 22 February via BookMyShow Justin Bieber fans, here’s how to get his Mumbai concert tickets on 22 February via BookMyShow Tickets for Justin Bieber's concert in Mumbai will start on February 22. By: FE Online | Updated: February 20, 2017 3:09 PM Ready to watch Justin Bieber in Mumbai? (Twitter) 
Beliebers, are you dying to see your idol during his maiden visit to Mumbai during the Asian leg of his Purpose World Tour? If so, here’s how to get your hands on Justin Bieber’s show in May. BookMyShow will be dealing with the sale of the tickets exclusively. Make sure you’ve saved up because these tickets cost a whopping Rs 4,000, but you can’t really put a price on watching the Biebs live, can you? Here are the details regarding the sales of the tickets. Be sure you know all the details beforehand to watch Justin in complete comfort. 
When will the tickets be sold? 
You will find the tickets on BookMyShow. The sale will begin at 12:00 pm on February 22. Expect the online rush to be just the same as if they were being sold live, so get onto the website ahead of time. There will also be special tickets with which you have the option to purchase food and drinks. 
How can I avoid the ticket sale rush? 
The website is giving the option to register earlier for the concert. That way, you’ll be eligible for a limited pre-sale which will start at 12:00 pm on February 21. 
How much does a ticket cost? 
Depending on which row you choose, the prices will vary. However, the starting price is Rs 4,000 and above. 
Where will Justin be performing? 
Justin will perform live at DY Patil Stadium, Mumbai, on May 10. 
You might like to watch: 
Will Justin be performing anywhere else in India? 
Unfortunately, the What Do You Mean singer won’t be performing anywhere else in the country. Though it is rumoured that he’ll take a short India tour, although it is unknown which places he’ll visit. For diehard Beliebers, other international stops of the Purpose World Tour include Tel Aviv and Dubai. Please Wait while comments are loading...
